LanguageData.R_CookNaturalSalt.label: Make Natural salt (25)
LanguageData.R_CookSyrup10.label: Make Rice syrup(25)
LanguageData.R_CookSyrup10.description: Begin by boiling rice to extract its sugar, then use that sugar to create syrup.
LanguageData.R_CookVinegarBarrel.label: Make a Rice vinegar barrel
LanguageData.R_CookVinegarBarrel.description: Combine several types of rice and allow them to ferment in a barrel; once ready, the barrel can be unpacked for rice vinegar.
LanguageData.R_CookVinegar10.label: Make Rice vinegar (25)
LanguageData.R_CookVinegar10.description: Unpack a barrel to attain rice vinegar.
LanguageData.R_CookSoySauceBarrel.label: Make a Soy sauce barrel
LanguageData.R_CookSoySauceBarrel.description: Pack soybeans into a barrel and ferment with salt; once ready, the barrel can be unpacked for soy sauce.
LanguageData.R_CookSoySauce10.label: Make Soy sauce (25)
LanguageData.R_CookSoySauce10.description: Unpack a barrel to attain soy sauce.
LanguageData.R_CookMisoBarrel.label: Make a Miso barrel
LanguageData.R_CookMisoBarrel.description: Pack soybeans into a barrel and ferment with salt; once ready, the barrel can be unpacked for Miso.
LanguageData.R_CookMiso10.label: Make Miso (25)
LanguageData.R_CookMiso10.description: Unpack a barrel to attain Miso.
